      • importProducerDataBase

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,MediaMaker> importProducerDataBase(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method will read in the file containing the information of interest and then begin parsing that information into Producer objects. It will achieve this by reading the data one line at a time. It will then commence reading the line backwards in order to simplify the process.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file to be read.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • importDirectorDataBase

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,MediaMaker> importDirectorDataBase(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method will read in the file containing the information of interest and then begin parsing that information into Director objects. It will achieve this by reading the data one line at a time. It will then commence reading the line backwards in order to simplify the process.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file to be read.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
